headline: Jim Cramer on Workday Stock: “I’m Worried”
summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ:WDAY) is one of the 11 stocks Jim Cramer put under the microscope recently. During the lightning round, a caller inquired about the company, and Cramer replied: “I’m worried. There’s a lot of companies coming for Workday, and I don’t like that. I think that what happens is we begin to see what’s […]
